name: MyChorz
0:
”Alexa, Begin My Chorz”
”Alexa, Launch My Chorz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my chorz
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Chorz! This skill can help you manage and monitor your kid’s chores, kids can also find out what chores they have to complete today!

To get started, download the Chorz app from the app store on your phone, then link your account through the Amazon Alexa app.

As a parent you can ask Alexa how your kids are doing to get a full recap on who has done what chores, or you can ask Alexa about just one of your kids, to find out what chores they have done and what they have left to do!

As a child, you can ask Alexa what chores you have left, and how many you have left to do today. Once you have done a chore, you can tell Alexa, and she will mark it as complete for you!

You can say things like: 
- My name is (name). (To choose who is talking)
- Change family member. (To change who is talking)
- How are my kids doing today? (To get a full recap of your kid’s chores)
- How is (name) doing today? (To find get a recap on a specific kid)
- What chores have I got left? (To get a list of remaining chores)
- How many chores do I have? (To find out how many chores you have left)
- I have finished (chore). (To set a chore as complete)
- I have finished a chore! (To start the process of completing a chore)
